name: Kittea Room
description:
Fill cats' teacups before they break them! To play this you need a mouse. When you see a cat in the mood for some tea, start pouring it by holding left mouse button. The goal is to score ten points.

Art:

murmurarium (Twitter, Tumblr)

Music: 

“My Fat Cat” by Eric Matyas

www.soundimage.org

Happy Ukulele 

by audionautix.com

Extra sound effects:

freesound.org

=^._.^=

Browser version was tested in Chrome, if you find any issues feel free to message.
